New Records: Dawid Malan scored 140 runs for England, the highest score in the match
England achieved their highest score in the World Cup 2023-24 with 364/9
Dawid Malan was named Player of the Match and Man of the Match
England won by 137 runs, the largest margin in the series so far
Key Match Events: Jonny Bairstow fell for 52 runs after a solid 88.13 SR
Dawid Malan fell for 140 runs after a rapid 130.84 SR
Jos Buttler and Joe Root contributed significantly with 20 and 82 runs respectively
Bangladesh's top scorer Litton Das scored 76 runs but couldn't convert to a century
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh elected to field first in the match
England's batting powerplay in the first 10 overs was dominant with 61 runs without losing a wicket
Dawid Malan was reviewed twice during the match, once successfully and once not
Post-Match Reflections: Dawid Malan expressed pride in his performance and the team's win
England's coach reflected on the importance of the win ahead of the World Cup
The match was a significant morale booster for England
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium, Dharamsala
Slow over-rate penalty was imposed during the last 2 overs
A relay catch was successfully executed by Adil Rashid, Najmul Hossain Shanto, and Towhid Hridoy
Others: The match was the 7th match of the World Cup 2023-24
Umpires Ahsan Raza, Paul Wilson, and Adrian Holdstock were the main umpires
The match had a total attendance of 12,478 spectators
